display_long_description:
Welcome to PlayPal - AI Town! Chat, Fishing, Farming, Diving, Shooting, Crafting, Restaurant management,etc. Build your own town.

You were once a top holographic engineer at a leading tech company in Future City. While on vacation, you received an encrypted will from your late great-uncle: "I've left you a real inheritance on Emerald Isle, beware of ECOTECH..."

After inheriting the island, you decided to restore its prosperity by managing a farm, developing the town, and attracting more partners to grow the community.

Start by running a farm, raising animals, growing vegetables and fruits, catching butterflies, fishing, and attracting more partners to help you build the island, continually increasing the town's prosperity and population.

Here, you can also choose to do nothing but chat with AI partners, with support for multiple languages：English, French, German, Spanish, Italian.

Explore the story behind each character. Perhaps you can find a partner to live with on the island.

The game is still in development, with more features to come:

Explore the rich underwater world, catch a variety of marine fish, manage the largest restaurant in town, and team up with partners to unravel the island's mysteries!
